summary: Are you tired of Heimskr\'s shouting? This mod stops his preaching forever. He will still stand there and wave his arms, but you won\'t hear a thing.
descriptionHtml:
Are you tired of Heimskr\'s shouting? This mod stops his preaching forever. He will still stand there and wave his arms, but you won\'t hear a thing.

Just put it in your data folder and you\'ll never have to listen to him again.

\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
author: LawnGnome
